messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Conference speakers
messages.msgSnippet: What about Daniel Quinn?  I can t find the link, but he has some extremely interesting things to say about education and our culture in general on his website.
messages.messageBody:
What about Daniel Quinn? I can't find the link, but he has some extremely
interesting things to say about education and our culture in general on his
website. i think he would be a fascinating speaker! Also, Odds Bodkin is a
nother great story teller, since we can all see Jim Weiss this year we might
want someone new next year.

marjorie
